A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was AMAZING. A thrill ride from start to finish. The best parts were Rey and Kylo's OFF THE CHARTS CHEMISTRY. Incredible. I've seen it twice already and am planning to see it a third today. The character development is so well written\, and the epic fight scene is INCREDIBLE. I hope they continue with Kylo and Rey's chemistry in 9\, as it would be a disservice to TLJ if they do not. Everyone else's chemistry paled in comparison to Daisy and Adam together. INCREDIBLE.
